content: decrease round rs k2tog knit to last 2 sts repeat round 3 - 1 more time you should have 88 ssk sts on needle repeat the decrease round - 2 more times on every divide for body and sleeves 5th round you should have 12 sts on needles dividing round rs *sm place the stitches knit 3 more rounds work 4 rounds in twisted rib- before next marker on holder remove marker k bing bobble all sts loosely in ribbing on next round to m repeat once from * you should have 18 sts on each holder for sleeves and 52 finishing sts on needle for the body weave in all yarn ends and block the sweater to shape using your preferred method pattern copyright © veera välimäki 4 the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact veera 100rain@gmail com glossary abbreviations bobble bind off bor beginning of round pm place marker co cast on rs right side k knit sm slip marker k2tog knit 2 sts together decrease ssk slip slip knit 2 together through the back m1l left slanting increase make one left lift loop loops decrease between stitches on left needle inserting the needle st st stockinette stitch - knit on rs purl on from front to back knit into the back of the loop ws m1r right slanting increase make one right lift st s stitch es loop between stitches on left needle inserting the twisted ribbing needle from back to front knit into the front of the *k1 tbl p1 repeat from * to loop end p ws purl wrong side pattern copyright © veera välimäki 5 the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact veera 100rain@gmail com
